snippet.title: Coromon - Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST TODAY → http://bit.ly/CRE321

Coming to Steam and Switch in Q1 2022

Coromon is a modern monster taming game with retro pixelart. Coromon brings an immersive storyline, strategic turn-based combat and challenging puzzles to a classic genre. Select Nuzlocke-inspired difficulty modes for a punishing experience, customize your team, and explore Velua!
